titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (DEVELOPMENT ADDITIONAL QUESTION FOR NATIONAL NEONATAL DATA SET) - Description

div.p: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (DEVELOPMENT ADDITIONAL QUESTION FOR NATIONAL NEONATAL DATA SET) is the PERSON SCORE for an additional question relating to the Development section of the TPRG-SEND Two Year Corrected Age Outcome Assessment, required for the purposes of the National Neonatal Data Set - Two Year Neonatal Outcomes Assessment.
The question requiring a response is "Is the child's development between 0-3 months behind corrected age?".
